values.name: consent_form_disagree
values.description: No. I do not want to participate
values.value: No. I do not want to participate

values.name: consent_form_text
values.description: HTML text for the consent form
values.value:
Purpose of the Project

Project Karya aims to make paid digital work accessible to users in rural communities outside of large IT centers. In this task, you will help us by verifying Marathi speech data we have collected from our participatns.


Procedure

● If you are seeing this, you have successfully installed the Karya app.
● We would have given you a “16-digit Access Code”. You need to enter the code during the registration process. Each access code can be used only once. As part of the registration process, we will require you to sign-in with your phone number. This information will be used to identify you on the platform when you close the application and open it again. In addition, we will also collect your age range, and gender. The application will also ask you to choose a profile picture. This picture will only be used for display in the application.
● After completing the registration, the application will present you with a set of sentences with recordings (one sentence at a time). Your task is to rate the recording for accuracy, noise, and volume.


Risks and Benefits

• We recommend doing the provided work in a patient manner. This will allow you to submit more accurate reports and will also make sure you don’t spend too much time on the smartphone. Spending too much time on a smartphone could be bad for your eyes and may affect your social life. We recommend not working for more than 2 hours a day.

Personal Information

During the project, we will collect your name, picture, and age. Your personal information will only be used to identify you during the duration of the study. We will delete all personal information as soon as the study is over. We will not share your personal information with anyone. However, we may use pictures from the study in presentations or posters without identifying specific individuals. We will request your permission before taking pictures and obtain your permission to use those pictures in our presentations or posters. Not providing consent for taking pictures will not disqualify you from participating in the study.

For additional information or concerns about how Microsoft handles your personal information, please see the Microsoft Privacy Statement, https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521839


Payment for Participation

Based on the quality of the recording, we will pay you between INR 0.5 for every recording you rate.


Dataset Collected from the Study

We will use the dataset collected from this study for further research and will release it publicly for research purposes. This dataset will not contain any personally identifiable information. If you have any questions regarding how the dataset will be used, please feel free to ask us through your project coordinator or using the phone number provided below.


Contact Information

Should you have any questions concerning the project, you can contact Vivek Seshadri by phone at 9482393817. Should you have any questions about your rights as a research subject, please report your concern via email to Microsoft Research Ethics Program Feedback: MSRStudyfeedback@microsoft.com. In case you do not have access to email, you can contact your project coordinator, and have her relay your concerns.


Consent

By clicking “I agree” below, you confirm that the study was explained to you, you had a chance to ask questions before beginning the study, and all your questions were answered satisfactorily. By clicking “I agree” below, you voluntarily consent to participate, and you do not give up any legal rights you have as a study participant. On behalf of Microsoft and Navana Tech India, we thank you for your contribution and look forward to your research session.


Do you understand and consent to these terms?

values.name: consent_form_summary
values.description: Summarize the key points in the consent form
values.value: Thank you for participating in the research study as part of Project Karya. Please listen to this message carefully. The goal of this study is to collect speech data from users in the Odia language in finance, agriculture, and health care domains. In this study, you will help us generate the speech data by reading out sentences in Odia. This data will then be used to train computers and smartphones to understand Odia and in turn build applications that can interact with Odia speakers. You will be paid for your work. In this study, you have the opportunity to earn upto rupees 1200. The speech data collected from you will be released and used for research purposes. We will not store or release any of your personal information. Please read the consent form in this page for more details
